title: Talabat-aligned IPO Inputs
description: Typed input schema for Talabat-style prospectus generation fields.

fields.label: Issuer Name
fields.help_text: Legal issuer name as it should appear in the prospectus.

fields.label: Offer Shares
fields.help_text: Total number of Offer Shares as an integer count (comma formatting will be applied automatically).

fields.label: Percentage Offered
fields.help_text: Percentage of issued share capital being offered.

fields.label: Nominal Value per Share (AED)
fields.help_text: Nominal value of each share in AED.

fields.label: Offer Price Range per Offer Share (AED) - Low
fields.help_text: Lower bound of the Offer Price Range per Offer Share in AED.

fields.label: Offer Price Range per Offer Share (AED) - High
fields.help_text: Upper bound of the Offer Price Range per Offer Share in AED.

fields.label: Currency
fields.help_text: Currency is fixed to AED for Talabat schema.

fields.label: Key Dates
fields.help_text: Key timetable details (free text for now).
fields.example: Bookbuilding opens on TBD and closes on TBD

fields.label: Business Description
fields.help_text: Summary of issuer operations and strategy.
fields.example: The Group operates a leading online food delivery platform in MENA.

fields.label: Risk Factors
fields.help_text: One risk factor per line in the UI.
fields.example: Risks related to regional macroeconomic conditions

fields.label: Tranche 1 Minimum Subscription (AED)
fields.help_text: Minimum subscription amount for Tranche 1 in AED.

fields.label: Tranche 1 Increment (AED)
fields.help_text: Subscription increment for Tranche 1 in AED.

fields.label: Tranche 2 Minimum Subscription (AED)
fields.help_text: Minimum subscription amount for Tranche 2 in AED.
